mapper.select: SELECT c.COURSE_CODE AS courseCode, c_s.COURSE_START_TIME AS courseStartTime, c_s.COURSE_END_TIME AS courseEndTime, c_s.COURSE_DAY AS courseDay FROM STUDENT_SCHEDULE s_s JOIN COURSE c on s_s.COURSE_CODE = c.COURSE_CODE JOIN COURSE_SCHEDULE c_s on c.COURSE_CODE = c_s.COURSE_CODE JOIN PROCESSOR p on c.PROFESSOR_CODE = p.PROFESSOR_CODE WHERE s_s.STUDENT_CODE = 'studentCode'
